information: The company SIMONS METALLGUSS GMBH, is a Manufacturer/ Producer, founded in 1944, which operates in the Steel industry. It also operates in the Iron, special grade and pig iron, Aluminium and aluminium alloys, Foundries, aluminium, and Metals, precious and special industries. It is based in Düren, Germany.
